description: DatabaseSchemaMetadata is the schema metadata for databases.

character_set.description: The character set of the database.

datashare.description: The database belongs to a datashare.

event_triggers.description:
The list of event triggers in a database (PostgreSQL specific).
 Event triggers are database-level objects, not schema-scoped.

extensions.description: The list of extensions in a database.

schemas.description: The list of schemas in a database.

search_path.description: The search_path is the search path of a PostgreSQL database.

service_name.description: The service name of the database. It's an Oracle-specific concept.

title: Database Schema Metadata
